The bill proposed by Democrats in the U: S. House aimed to expand absentee-by-mail voting.
The tweet by David Lewis: a Republican member of the North Carolina House of Representatives, accused Nancy Pelosi of trying to block voter ID/absentee ballot protections.
The U: S. House bill endorsed by Pelosi would prohibit states from requiring signatures on absentee ballots and allow any person to return a voted and sealed absentee ballot without compensation based on the number of ballots collected and returned.
